001package org.nasdanika.common;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Arrays;
005import java.util.Collection;
006import java.util.List;
007
008public class ListCompoundSupplierFactory<T> implements SupplierFactory<List<T>> {
009
010        private String name;
011        private List<SupplierFactory<? extends T>> elements = new ArrayList<>();
012
013        public ListCompoundSupplierFactory(String name, Collection<? extends SupplierFactory<? extends T>> elements) {
014                this.name = name;
015                this.elements.addAll(elements);
016        }
017        
018        @SafeVarargs
019        public ListCompoundSupplierFactory(String name, SupplierFactory<? extends T>... elements) {
020                this(name, Arrays.asList(elements));
021        }
022
023        @Override
024        public Supplier<List<T>> create(Context context) {
025                ListCompoundSupplier<T> ret = new ListCompoundSupplier<>(name);
026                for (SupplierFactory<? extends T> e: elements) {
027                        ret.add(e == null ? null : e.create(context));
028                }
029                return ret;
030        }
031        
032        public void add(SupplierFactory<? extends T> element) {
033                elements.add(element);
034        }
035        
036        public void addAll(Iterable<? extends SupplierFactory<? extends T>> elements) {
037                elements.forEach(this::add);
038        }
039
040}
